CatDescriptText: Turney Charles, office maintenance worker, Centre Avenue "Y" was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 21, 1961, pg. 7 with question: "Do you think that men should marry women within their own age bracket (not over fiver years difference) or do you approve of 'May and December' marriages?" answer reads: "It would be good if the man is about 10 years older."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Turney Charles wearing v neck pullover and light colored hat, standing in front of ribbed metal wall, two men in background on either side
